ProjectTitle: Identification of drug resistance mechanisms and acquired sensitivities in resistant cancer cells using genome-wide CRISPR-mediated screens
InitialFeedbackHistory: 05/07/2022 3. [REDACTED] in the data table you mention SW26 and SW39 cells. Please note that human cells now also fall under the biobank law and you need to register the use, for more information see: www.kuleuven.be/english/research/associatienet/ethics/guidance/humanmaterial 7. [REDACTED] have you considered any specific data repositories for sharing, maybe those from EBI (www.ebi.ac.uk/submission/)?
